AN award-winning taxidermist from North Yorkshire is bringing a long-lost bird back from extinction  at least in model form.
The creations of Carl Church will be the centre of the Great Dodo Exhibition at Kendal Museum from July 4
continuation: to September 30 . Mr Church , who has been working on the project for the previous two years , said : " I ' m very excited to be working with Kendal Museum on this project ." I ' ve been fascinated by the Dodo since I was a baby and it ' s great to be able to bring this species back from extinction . " The Great Dodo is a species of bird that once roamed the British Isles , but was wiped out due to the introduction of rats .The exhibition will include models of the dodo , as well as a collection of other models of the extinct bird . Mr Church , who runs a taxidermy business in Northallerton , near York , said : " It ' s a tremendous opportunity to bring the Dodo back from extinction ." It ' s a very unusual breed and it ' s great to be able to bring it returned to life . " The exhibition will also feature a selection of other models of the extinct bird .Mr Church said : " We ' ve been collaborating on the model for the previous two years and it ' s been a tremendous experience . " It ' s really exciting to be doing this project . "The exhibition will run from July 4 to September 30 at Kendal Museum .
paraphrase:
An accomplished taxidermist from North Yorkshire is revolutionizing the field by bringing a long-lost bird back to life through intricate model forms.
Carl Church's remarkable creations will take center stage at the Great Dodo Exhibition at Kendal Museum from July 4th to September 30th. With years of dedication to the project, Church expressed his excitement to collaborate with the museum, stating, "I'm thrilled to be working with Kendal Museum on this incredible endeavor." Since childhood, Church has been fascinated by the Dodo, and he is now ecstatic to revive this species from extinction.
The exhibition will showcase a variety of models, including the Dodo, as well as other extinct bird species. Church, who runs a successful taxidermy business in Northallerton, emphasized the significance of this project, saying, "It's a remarkable opportunity to bring the Dodo back to life." Church has been working tirelessly on the project for two years, and he expressed his enthusiasm for the exhibition, stating, "It's truly an exciting experience."
In addition to the Dodo models, the exhibition will feature a selection of other extinct bird species. Church noted that the collaboration with the museum has been an exceptional experience, saying, "We've been working together on this project for two years, and it's been a fantastic experience." The Great Dodo Exhibition will run from July 4th to September 30th at Kendal Museum.

The Seattle area has a new biotechnology company -- and this one is going to try attacking cancer by examining antibodies instead of tumors.
Johnny Stine, founder and chief scientist of the new Spaltudaq Corp., said the approach, if it
continuation: works , might have a huge impact on cancer treatment . " We ' re going to see at cancer cells and find if we can find a way to broke them down so they can ' t get into the bodies , " Stine said ." We ' re going to look at the immune system and find if we can take rid of the cancer cells so they can ' t do anything . " Stine , a cancer researcher at the University of Washington School of Medicine , said the company is moving quickly to develop the technology , which is known as antibody - drug conjugates ." We ' re not going to wait for the FDA to approve it , " Stine said . " We ' re going to going ahead and do it . "Stine said the company plans to file for FDA authorization by the end of the year . The company is working with the Seattle Cancer Care Alliance , which is offering a $ 1 million grant to assist with the development of the technology .Stine said the new technology could have a huge impact on cancer treatment . " It ' s going to be a game - changer , " Stine said ." It ' s going to be the most important stuff in physicians in the next 20 years . "
paraphrase:
Spaltudaq Corp., a newly established biotech firm in the Seattle area, is taking an innovative approach to cancer treatment by targeting antibodies rather than tumors. Founder and chief scientist, Johnny Stine, expressed optimism about the potential impact of this approach, stating that it could significantly improve cancer treatment.
Stine explained that the company's strategy involves examining the immune system to identify ways to eliminate cancer cells without allowing them to spread to the body. He emphasized the urgency of this research, stating that they will not wait for regulatory approval before moving forward.
Spaltudaq is collaborating with the Seattle Cancer Care Alliance, which is providing a $1 million grant to support the development of the technology. According to Stine, the new approach could be a game-changer in cancer treatment, with the potential to revolutionize the field in the next 20 years.

Want to freshen up that Easter brunch? Its all about the blooms. Here, we share pro tips for elevating your arrangements.
Its been awhile since weve had company. To be honest,
continuation: we  re prepared for a change . And Easter is the perfect time to get out and about .But in order to do it right , you  ll require to make sure you  re doing it right . When it comes to flowers , there  s a lot to think about .It  s not just the plants themselves that you  ll require to consider , but the arrangement itself . Here , we  ve rounded up tips on how to freshen up your Easter brunch preparations .How to freshen up your Easter brunch preparations 1 . Use fresh flowers Fresh plants are the best way to freshen up your arrangements .You  ll want to search for flowers that are in season , and you  ll want to make sure that they  re not damaged . Fresh petals are also good because they  ll last longer .They  re also easier to care for . If you  re using a living flower , you  ll want to make sure it  s fresh and healthy .If you  re using synthetic plants , you  ll want to make sure that they  re in good form . 2 .
paraphrase:
Want to enhance your Easter brunch spread? Let's bloom! We've got some expert tips to elevate your flower arrangements.
It's been a while since we've had guests over, and to be honest, we're excited for a change. Easter is the perfect time to get out and about, but to do it right, you'll want to make sure you're doing it right. When it comes to flowers, there's a lot to consider. It's not just the plants themselves, but the arrangement itself. We've compiled some tips to help you freshen up your Easter brunch preparations.
1. Go for fresh flowers: Fresh plants are the way to go to refresh your arrangements. Look for flowers that are in season and make sure they're not damaged. Fresh petals will last longer and are easier to care for. If you're using live flowers, make sure they're fresh and healthy. If you're using synthetic plants, check that they're in good condition.
2. Get creative with colors: Don't be afraid to mix and match different colors to create a unique arrangement. Consider pairing soft pastels with bold hues for a statement look.
3. Add some greenery: Incorporating greenery like leaves, ferns, or eucalyptus can add depth and texture to your arrangements.
4. Play with shapes and sizes: Mixing different shapes and sizes of flowers can create a visually interesting arrangement. Try combining large, showy blooms with smaller, more delicate ones.
5. Don't forget the vase: A beautiful vase can make a big difference in the overall look of your arrangement. Choose a vase that complements the colors and style of your flowers.
By following these tips, you'll be able to create a stunning and fresh Easter brunch spread that will impress your guests. Happy decorating!

Eden Hazard was facing an extended ban for kicking out at a ball boy after the Football Association charged him over his sending-off in Chelsea's Capital One Cup exit at Swansea.
Belgian playmaker Hazard was already set to serve an automatic three
continuation: - game banned for his red card against the Swans , which will rule him out of Saturday ' s Premier League clash with Manchester United . The 28 - year - old was sent off in the first half of Chelsea ' s 2 - 0 defeat at the Liberty Stadium on Wednesday after appearing to kick out at a ball boy as the match descended into chaos .Eden Hazard was convicted by the Football Association over his sent off against Swansea The 28 - year - old was already set to serve an automatic three - game suspension for his green card against the Swans The player was convicted by the Football Association over his sent off in Wednesday ' s Capital One Cup defeat The FA confirmed Hazard had been charged and could face a further sanction for his actions . ' Eden Hazard has been charged by the FA with a breach of FA Rule E3 preceding his dismissal in Wednesday ' s Capital One Cup fixture against Swansea City , ' the governing body says in a statement .' It is accused that the Chelsea player committed an offence contrary to FA Rule E3 ( 1 ) ( a ) , ( b ) and ( c ) . ' It is further claimed that the Chelsea player committed an offence contrary to FA Rule E3 ( 1 ) ( d ) and ( e ) .
paraphrase: Eden Hazard faced the possibility of a lengthy ban after being charged by the Football Association for his dismissal in Chelsea's Capital One Cup exit at Swansea. The 28-year-old Belgian playmaker was already set to serve an automatic three-game suspension for his red card against the Swans, which would have ruled him out of the following Premier League clash with Manchester United. In a chaotic scene during the first half of the match at the Liberty Stadium on Wednesday, Hazard appeared to kick out at a ball boy, leading to his sending-off. The Football Association confirmed that Hazard had been charged and could face additional sanctions for his actions. According to the FA, Hazard was accused of breaching FA Rule E3, which relates to unsporting behavior, including kicking or attempting to kick a ball, or a person, or making any other action that is deemed to be against the spirit of the game. The charges against Hazard specified that he committed an offence contrary to FA Rule E3 (1)(a), (b), and (c), as well as (d) and (e).

In the 1940s, India's film industry continued to make films in black and white, marking a significant milestone in the country's cinema history.

input: The vast majority of the 45 Amazon.com customers who have reviewed Bloomberg Businessweek writer Brad Stones new book, The Everything Store: Jeff Bezos and the Age of Amazon, gave it five stars. Lone among them, however, is a
continuation: woman who writes under the pseudonym  Annie .  She  s been a loyal Amazon user for more than a year , and she writes that Stone  s book is  the most comprehensive and insightful look at Amazon yet .  Annie , who asked not to be identified by her last name , says that Stone  s book  presents the real Jeff Bezos , and I believe it  s going to be a game - changer .  Amazon  s influence on retail is undeniable . The corporation  s progress over the previous decade has been staggering , and it  s the most valuable business in the world .Amazon  s share of the U . S . e - commerce market is growing faster than any other company , and it  s on track to become the world  s leading store by the end of this year . Stone  s book takes a deep dive into Amazon  s business and culture , and it  s a fascinating read .It  s a must - read for anyone who wants to comprehend how a corporation that  s developed so quickly and become so big can be so secretive .
paraphrase: Most of the 45 Amazon.com customers who reviewed Brad Stone's book, "The Everything Store: Jeff Bezos and the Age of Amazon," gave it five stars. However, one woman, who wishes to remain anonymous under the pseudonym "Annie," had a different perspective. As a loyal Amazon user for over a year, she found Stone's book to be the most comprehensive and insightful look at Amazon yet. Annie believes that Stone's book accurately portrays the real Jeff Bezos and will be a game-changer in understanding Amazon's influence on retail. With its remarkable growth over the past decade, Amazon is now the most valuable business in the world, and its share of the US e-commerce market is increasing faster than any other company. Stone's book delves into Amazon's business and culture, making it a fascinating read for anyone seeking to understand how such a rapidly growing corporation can remain secretive.

WASHINGTON  Republican David Yancey won a drawing to break a tie in the disputed 94th District race in Newport News Thursday however his opponent is expected to challenge the decision, possibly seeking yet another recount.
Control of the House of Delegates is
continuation: at stake in Thursday  s election , with Democrats needing a net win of 23 seats to take control of the chamber . Republicans need to hold onto 23 seats to keep their majority .Yancey , a Newport News city councilman , beat Democratic challenger and longtime Virginia Beach Mayor Mike Signer by a margin of 5 , 844 votes out of almost 1 . 5 million cast . Yancey , who has served in the state House of Delegates since 2014 , was proclaimed the winner by the Virginia State Board of Elections after a recount .Signer  s campaign has filed a lawsuit in federal court to contest the results . Signer  s campaign said in a news release Thursday that Yancey  s victory was  irreversible .   The Board  s decision was arbitrary and capricious , and the Board  s decision was not supported by substantial proof ,  the campaign said .Signer stated in a statement Thursday that he was  greatly unhappy  in the decision .  I will continue to campaign for the people of the 94th District and the honesty of our elections ,  he said .I will
paraphrase: Republican David Yancey was declared the winner of the tightly contested 94th District race in Newport News after a drawing to break a tie, but his opponent, Democratic challenger Mike Signer, has vowed to challenge the decision. The outcome of the election, which could determine control of the House of Delegates, has been marked by controversy and recounts. Yancey, a Newport News city councilman and former state delegate, edged out Signer by a slim margin of 5,844 votes out of over 1.5 million cast. Despite the Virginia State Board of Elections proclaiming Yancey the winner, Signer's campaign has filed a lawsuit in federal court to contest the results, arguing that the Board's decision was arbitrary and capricious and not supported by substantial evidence. Signer expressed disappointment in the decision and vowed to continue campaigning for the people of the 94th District and ensuring the integrity of their elections.

input: WASHINGTON  The professions expected to show one of the biggest job growth rates in 2017 and the largest growth in sheer number of jobs will be trade skills, according to a year-end report from CareerBuilder and labor market data provider Emsi.
continuation: Trade skills are expected to be the fastest - increasing profession in 2017 , with an increase of almost 30 percent ,  the report says . The review , released Thursday , also discovered that workers in the professional and business services , construction , education and medical care industries are expected to expand the most . The growth in trade competence is a reflection of the fact that the U . S . economy is becoming more globalized ,  says Emsi Chief Economist and co - writer of the report , Jason Furman .  We predict to see the greatest rise in trade skills in the professional and business services industry ,  Furman stated .CareerBuilder  s study also discovered that workers in the leisure and hospitality trade will grow the least in 2017 .  Leisure and hospitality employment are expected to grow by just 2 percent in 2017 ,  the report says . This is the smallest growth rate of any industry .  The review also discovered that workers in the transportation and warehousing industry will grow the most in 2017 .  Transportation and warehousing jobs are expected to expand by more than 40 percent ,
paraphrase: In 2017, trade professions are expected to experience significant job growth, with an increase of almost 30%, according to a recent report by CareerBuilder and labor market data provider Emsi. The review found that workers in professional and business services, construction, education, and medical care industries are also expected to see significant growth. The increase in trade competence can be attributed to the growing globalization of the US economy, as stated by Emsi Chief Economist and co-author of the report, Jason Furman. The report predicts that the professional and business services industry will see the greatest rise in trade skills. Meanwhile, leisure and hospitality employment is expected to grow at the slowest rate, by only 2%, while transportation and warehousing jobs are expected to experience the highest growth, expanding by over 40%.

Pedro Gonzalez faces the possibility of spending up to 48 years in prison for allegedly attempting to harm Dita Richterova fatally.
Friends have created a fundraising page on GoFundMe for Dita Richterova, who was gravely injured during an attack at Pedro Gonzalez's home in Brush Creek. Gonzalez, 35, is charged with attempted first-degree murder in Richterova's case. According to the arrest warrant, Richterova was attacked by Gonzalez and two other individuals in July.
